title: Fort Pulaski National Monument: Junior Civil War Historian Online Activities
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be a Junior Civil War Historian     Junior Civil War Historian Online Activities                Junior Civil War Historian Online Activities          Â    If you choose Option 2 for becoming a Junior Civil War Historian, complete one of the activities below. Be sure to bring a print-out of the completed activity with you when you visit a participating park to get your patch. Check back here for new and updated activities.  Exploring The Civil War: Looking at Pictures War For Freedom: African Americans in the Era of the Civil War (Complete One Activity)Web Ranger Activity: Civil War Soldier  Web Ranger Activity: Help Lincoln Get to the White House Web Ranger Activity: Protect the Harbor
